TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Kakrot, title = Kakrot, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kakrot} }

S.FORM: == Kakorot 野苦瓜 == takaray a sowal o kakorot hananay i, ira ko nipaloma'an ira ko rengaw sanay i taliyok no loma' ato palapalaan. yo itiraay i taliyok no loma' a kakorot i,o tayaling han nita a pangangan, nawhan matiya o tayaling to tosiya a nengnengen sa pangangan han to tayalin. nikawrira mamamamangay cowa ka tata'ang, malecaday toya nipalomaan a 'angrer.

== Kakorot 野苦瓜 == takaray a sowal o kakorot hananay i, ira ko nipaloma'an ira ko rengaw sanay i taliyok no loma' ato palapalaan. yo itiraay i taliyok no loma' a kakorot i,o tayaling han nita a pangangan, nawhan matiya o tayaling to tosiya a nengnengen sa pangangan han to tayalin. nikawrira mamamamangay cowa ka tata'ang, malecaday toya nipalomaan a 'angrer.
